name: Durian Smoothie
description: It's that time of year again.  My annual plug for durian, the oft-maligned, odoriferous fruit beloved in Southeast Asia and beyond.  Usually, my advice to durian novices is to select a fruit with the least-pungent smelling odor you can find since different kinds of durian will range from mildly cheesy-smelling to gym-locker-stench-evoking. Durian smoothies are a treat on a hot summer's day.  You might even get a few durian converts if you serve the fruit in smoothie form, which offers a milder kick of that distinctive cheesy taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Place everything into a blender and blend until smooth, adding more condensed milk to taste. Serve immediately.
